mapper.select: update INSBSpecifydriver set operator = #{operator},modifytime = NOW(),noti = #{noti},taskid = #{taskid},carinfoid = #{carinfoid},personid = #{personid},licenseDesc = #{licenseDesc},licenseState = #{licenseState},isPrimary = #{isPrimary},relation = #{relation},licenseType = #{licenseType},habits = #{habits} where id = #{id}
